name: Black Granite Inscription (free)
label: In loving Memory of MICHAEL GEORGE JONAS

name: Black Granite Inscription (free)
label: Kop klip In loving Memory of MICHAEL GEORGE JONAS   A loving Husband, Father, Brother, Son and Grandfather    Sunrise: 15 July 1959 Sunset: 15 August 2021  Ps: 34:4  I sought the Lord, and He heard me, delivered me from all my fears.        Blad  He never looked for praises He was never a boast He just went on quietly working  For the ones he loved the most.  His dreams were seldom spoken His wants was very few And most of the time his worries  went unspoken too.  He was there... A firm foundation  Through all our storms of life A sturdy hand to hold on to In times of stress and strive.  A true friend we could turn to  When times were good or bad One of our greatest blessings  The man we called Dad
